prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant purple wings and a charming expression.
Imagine a cute, fluffy Pokemon that loves to flutter around flowers in springtime.
Design a poison-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and can camouflage easily.
Show me a colorful Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, blending with the cityscape.
Generate a winged Pokemon with a graceful flight pattern and sparkling eyes.
Make a Pokemon that is both small and agile, perfect for quick dodges in battles.
I want a Pokemon with distinctive antennae and an alluring color palette.
